EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Angela, It was nice speaking with you today. Your best bet to secure benefits for your employees is by going with a Professional Employer Organization (PEO.) If you just type “PEO” into Google you will find many to choose from. Please let me know if I can help. Take care,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
